title: We left Afghanistan, but not Guantanamo
description: After 9/11, the CIA began detaining people who they believed had information about the next attack. In custody, they used a brutal and ineffective method of questioning, euphemistically known as “Enhanced Interrogation Techniques” — which outside groups later called, “torture.” Chuck speaks with filmmaker Alex Gibney talks about his latest documentary, “The Forever Prisoner.”
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
